title: Dear Summoner,
body:
It has come to our attention that you are an unskilled player. Many complaints have been made towards you and your skill level and as a result we have decided to cease your account with us.

League of Legends is only for the best of the best of players and is not for those players that simply have no skill and wish to have fun. If at any time you feel these rules are unfair you can kindly bugger off and go elsewhere.

If you should become a skilled player in the future, please do not hesitate to contact us so  we can ignore your request and continue on in our life.

Much Love
The Creator

replies.body: All this coming from a level 8
you guys realise it so then they monitor it and they get placed in queues with people of lower skill level, well thats what I'm lead to believe..
you guys realise it so then they monitor it and they get placed in queues with people of lower skill level, well thats what I'm lead to believe..
I wonder why that report category exists. Maybe its a ploy where Riot actually monitors anyone who report people for being 'Unskilled'.
